Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Barack Obama "didn't do executive orders in the beginning," when in fact he signed multiple executive orders shortly after his inauguration.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Obama did issue executive orders at the beginning of his presidency.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is not backed up by any evidence or data.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Obama did not issue executive orders at the beginning of his presidency.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that Goldberg misunderstood or misremembered the timeline of Obama's executive orders.
